Package de.bcxp.challenge

package de.bcxp.challenge
The root package for the data challenge containing the entry point App and containing the resource files. Please create and document your own package structure appropriate to your design.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    de.bcxp.challenge.analysis
    Provides interfaces and classes for analyzing different types of documents, including CSV and JSON formats.
    de.bcxp.challenge.documentParsing
    Provides interfaces and classes for reading and parsing of different types of documents, from the classpath.
    de.bcxp.challenge.exceptions
    Contains custom exceptions.
    de.bcxp.challenge.model
    Contains core data model classes used to represent documents.
    de.bcxp.challenge.utility
    General purpose utility classes.
    Classes should all be final and declare a private constructor, since all classes should only provide static utility methods.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    App
    The entry class for your solution.
